name: Asen&Vili
description:
Try to master this speedrunning game with simple controls but tricky levels. You are playing as the penguin Vili who is trying to cross the jungle with the help of his best friend the snake Assssen. They are joined together and trying to catch one of 5 types of branches to swing around and get to the next portal.

By Sam,  hugoagogo, Delyanskiiii, Saskata, Viliam and theGergi.

Every single asset including the music hasss been done within the jam time limit.

IF YOU GET STUCK WHEN ENTERING A LEVEL RESTART THE WHOLE GAME. We couldn't fix that our bad :)
